message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $7500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
